Posts.Content: I am so sorry that you wife's cancer has recurred. I am praying for you and your wife. I live with family memebers who had cancer from a young age.I have learned from this experience that you can't depend on your living relatives to help you out. I found a website****LINK DELETED BY ADMIN PER FORUM POSTING POLICIES - PLEASE REVIEW IN TOP SECTION OF MAIN PAGE -- THANK YOU**** which provided me a sanctuary to ask questions, receive support, and share my experiences with others--and, the feedback I've received has enriched my life. We have learned or are learning. Together we have put out a lot of our fears.. we have been educated beyond what we learn on our own.
Posts.Title: Return of wife's cancer: No chemo.....???
